value.title: DAX Fridays! #23: ISFILTERED
value.excerpt: In this video we will through the ISFILTERED function in DAX. value.title: DAX Fridays! #30: SEARCH vs FIND
value.excerpt: In today's DAX Fridays! tutorial we are going to go though examples on how to use two DAX functions: SEARCH and FIND  SEARCH and FIND DAX functions are used to find the number of characters at which a specific word is found in a column. value.title: DAX Fridays! #66: TREATAS
value.excerpt: In this video we will go through the DAX function TREATAS. value.title: Fix the "Enter data" limitation in Power Query
value.excerpt: If you are trying to import data in Power BI using Power Query "Enter Data", you might see this message: "The clipboard contents are too large to be pasted into the table. Please split your data into multiple tables with less than 3,000 cells".  In this video I will show you one way to get around it.
